Download our updated digital brochure

In our updated digital brochure we have put together an overview of how we can help bring power to your procurement. 

Download the brochure to explore the range of agreements available, read customer case studies and testimonials and more.

We look forward to supporting your procurement needs in 2023.

We have added some new grants and funding opportunities to support you on your journey to net zero.

Our new Mobile Voice and Data Services agreement goes live soon, offering average savings of 60% on core services.

Our Tail Spend Solution agreement will help you identify and manage your low value, low volume spend.

Get in touch


If you would like to talk to someone and don’t know who your local account manager is please contact your regional lead:

  • Alex Byrne: North (North West, Yorkshire and Humber and North East)

  • Matthew Freeman: Central (East Midlands, West Midlands and East Anglia)

  • Andrea Fitzgerald: South (South East and South West)

  • Nicola Rees: London

You can also call our customer service team on 0345 410 2222 or email our customer service team.
